General.Name: Sovereign Cloud Holdings Ltd
General.Description: Sovereign Cloud Holdings Limited provides cloud services to Australian Governments and Critical National industries. The company offers sovereign cloud Infrastructure as a Service solution. In addition, it offers a cloud operating environment, which comprises compute, storage, backup, disaster recovery, SOC, and M365 Backup as a Service product, as well as workspace One that provides and endpoint management solution. Further, the company provides solutions to customers directly, as well as through various channel partners. Sovereign Cloud Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Canberra, Australia.
